plurals.name: ApplicationPreferencesActivity_this_will_immediately_trim_all_conversations_to_the_d_most_recent_messages
plurals.item: This will immediately trim all conversations to the most recent message.
This will immediately trim all conversations to the %d most recent messages.

resources.string: Session requires the Storage permission in order to attach photos, videos, or audio, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".
Received key exchange message, tap to process.
Send failed, tap for unsecured fallback
Sorry, there was an error setting your attachment.
There is no app available to handle this link on your device.
Session needs microphone access to send audio messages, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\".
Session needs storage access to send photos and videos.
You will be able to send voice messages and attachments once the recipient has approved this message request

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_saving_n_media_to_storage_warning
plurals.item: Saving this media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access it.\n\nContinue?
Saving all %1$d media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access them.\n\nContinue?

resources.string: Error while retrieving full resolution GIF
Tap and hold to record a voice message, release to send
Error downloading MMS message, tap to retry

plurals.name: MediaSendActivity_cant_share_more_than_n_items
plurals.item: You can\'t share more than %d item.
You can\'t share more than %d items.

resources.string: Received a message encrypted using an old version of Session that is no longer supported. Please ask the sender to update to the most recent version and resend the message.
Messages sent and received in this conversation will disappear %s after they have been seen.
Received key exchange message for invalid protocol version.
Received message with new safety number. Tap to process and display.
Your safety number with %s has changed.
A new version of Session is available, tap to update
MMS message encrypted for non-existing session
Session needs storage access in order to save to external storage, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".
Unable to save to external storage without permissions
You have pending Session messages, tap to open and retrieve
Quick response unavailable when Session is locked!
Please wait until attachment has finished downloading
Tapping the Enter Key will send message instead of starting a new line.
Generate link previews for supported URLs.
Automatically delete older messages once a conversation exceeds a specified length
Scan through all conversations and enforce conversation length limits
Send read receipts in one-to-one chats.
See and share typing indicators in one-to-one chats.
Delete messages older than 6 months from communities that have over 2,000 messages.
Receive a notification when a contact takes a screenshot of a one-to-one chat.
Allow message requests from Community conversations
Backups will be saved to external storage and encrypted with the passphrase below. You must have this passphrase in order to restore a backup.
I have written down this passphrase. Without it, I will be unable to restore a backup.
Cannot import backups from newer versions of Session
Please acknowledge your understanding by marking the confirmation check box.
Disable and delete all local backups?
Using a combination of advanced anonymous routing and end-to-end encryption technologies.
Friends don\'t let friends use compromised messengers. You\'re welcome.
Say hello to your Session ID
Your Session ID is the unique address people can use to contact you on Session. With no connection to your real identity, your Session ID is totally anonymous and private by design.
Please pick a shorter display name

Your recovery phrase is the master key to your Session ID — you can use it to restore your Session ID if you lose access to your device. Store your recovery phrase in a safe place, and don\'t give it to anyone.
Secure your account by saving your recovery phrase
Tap and hold the redacted words to reveal your recovery phrase, then store it safely to secure your Session ID.
Make sure to store your recovery phrase in a safe place
Users can share their Session ID by going into their account settings and tapping "Share Session ID", or by sharing their QR code.
Session needs camera access to scan QR codes
Scan the QR code of the open group you\'d like to join
Export your logs, then upload the file though Session\'s Help Desk.
You\'ll be notified of new messages reliably and immediately using Google\'s notification servers.
This will permanently delete your messages, sessions, and contacts. Would you like to clear only this device, or delete your entire account?
Are you sure you want to delete your data from the network? If you continue you will not be able to restore your messages or contacts.
Scan someone\'s QR code to start a conversation with them
Failed to activate backups. Please try again or contact support.
Select a backup file and enter the passphrase it was created with.
This is taking a while, would you like to skip?
Navigate to Settings → Recovery Phrase on your other device to show your QR code.
There are two ways Session can notify you of new messages.
You’ll be notified of new messages reliably and immediately using Google’s notification servers.
Session will occasionally check for new messages in the background.
Are you sure you want to unblock %s?
Are you sure you want to join the %s open group?
Failed to prepare attachment for sending.
Sending a message to this user will automatically accept their message request and reveal your Session ID.
Are you sure you want to decline this message request?
Are you sure you want to block this message request?
Your message request has been accepted.
Your message request is currently pending.
You have a new message request
Enables voice and video calls to and from other users.

resources.string: Start a new conversation by entering someone\'s Session ID or share your Session ID with them.
Please contact support to report the error.
Session will connect to Giphy to provide search results. You will not have full metadata protection when sending GIFs.
Some of your devices are using outdated versions. Syncing may be unreliable until they are updated.
%s has message requests from Community conversations turned off, so you cannot send them a message.
You have no messages in Note to Self.
You have no messages from %s.\nSend a message to start the conversation!
Session hides your IP by routing your messages through multiple service nodes in Session\'s decentralized network. This is your current path:
Require fingerprint, PIN, pattern or password to unlock Session.
Require a notification when a contact takes a screenshot of a one-to-one chat.
Show read receipts for all messages you send and receive.
Show link previews for supported URLs.
Your IP is visible to your call partner and an Oxen Foundation server while using beta calls.
Request incognito mode if available. Depending on the keyboard you are using, your keyboard may ignore this request.

Use your recovery password to load your account on new devices. Your account cannot be recovered without your recovery password. Make sure it\'s stored somewhere safe and secure — and don\'t share it with anyone.
Export your logs, then upload the file through Session\'s Help Desk.
To load your account, enter the recovery password that was given to you when you signed up.
This is your recovery password. If you send it to someone they\'ll have full access to your account.
It can be your real name, an alias, or anything else you like — and you can change it at any time.
Are you sure you want to clear all message and group invites?
Are you sure you want to delete this message request?
You missed a call from [Test Name] because you haven\'t enabled Voice and Video Calls in Privacy Settings.
You can enable the \'Voice and Video Calls\' permission in the Privacy Settings.
Voice and Video Calls require notifications to be enabled in your device system settings.
This will permanently delete your messages and contacts. Would you like to clear this device only, or delete your data from the network as well?
Start a new conversation by entering someone\'s Account ID or scanning their QR code.
Are you sure you want to delete your conversation with [USER NAME]? New messages from [USER NAME] will start a new conversation.
Enter your friend\'s Account ID or ONS
We couldn\'t recognise this ONS. Please check it and try again.
This Account ID is invalid. Please check and try again.
Friends can message you by scanning your QR code.
Please enter a shorter group name.
Please pick at least one other group member.
Groups have a maximum of 100 members.
You don\'t have any conversations yet
Please check the Community URL and try again.
Are you sure you want to leave [Test Group]?
[USER NAME] has turned disappearing messages off.
Would you like to automatically download all files from [USER/GROUP]?
Can\'t find an app to select media.
This file type is not supported.
You don\'t have any files in this conversation.
Are you sure you want to block {name}? Blocked users cannot send you message requests, group invites or call you.
Unblock this contact to send a message.
Display previews for URLs you send and receive. This can be useful, however Session must contact linked websites to generate previews. You can always turn off link previews in Session\'s settings.
Are you sure you want to open %s in your browser?
Are you sure you want to delete this message for everyone?
Session needs camera access to take photos or videos.
Session needs camera access to take photos and videos, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
Session is engineered to protect your privacy.
You don\'t even need a phone number to sign up.
